text: They have indeed not believed who say, "God is certainly the Messiah, the Son of Mary." Say, "Then who has power against God in anything, if He intends to destroy the Messiah, the Son of Mary and his mother and whoever is on the earth, all together?" And the kingdom of the skies and the earth and (all) that is between them is God's. He creates that which He wills and God has power over everything
